footer.vatNote: Prices include 25.5% VAT. All times in Finnish time (EET/EEST).

whoWeAre.title: 1. Who We Are
whoWeAre.content: Spothinta is a free web application that displays real-time electricity spot prices in Finland. We are committed to protecting your privacy and being transparent about how we handle data.

dataWeCollect.title: 2. Data We Collect
dataWeCollect.intro: We collect minimal data necessary to provide our service:

necessary.title: Necessary Data (stored locally in your browser)

optional.title: Optional Analytics (only if you enable them)
optional.intro: When you opt-in to analytics in Settings, we collect:
optional.pageViews: Anonymous page views (which pages you visit)
optional.device: Basic device info (browser type, screen size)

necessary.title: Necessary cookies
necessary.content: Legitimate interest - required for the app to function properly

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.content: Consent - only collected if you explicitly enable them in Settings

thirdParties.title: 4. Third-Party Services
thirdParties.intro: We use the following third-party services:
thirdParties.vercel: Hosting and analytics (if enabled). Vercel may process data in the US under appropriate safeguards.
thirdParties.sahkotin: Electricity price data API. No personal data is sent to this service.
thirdParties.openMeteo: Weather data API. No personal data is sent to this service.

dataRetention.title: 5. Data Retention
dataRetention.localStorage: Local storage: Until you clear browser data or use 'Clear all local data' in Settings
dataRetention.analytics: Analytics data (if enabled): Retained by Vercel according to their privacy policy

yourRights.title: 6. Your Rights
yourRights.intro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
yourRights.portability: Right to data portability (export your data)
yourRights.withdraw: Right to withdraw consent for analytics at any time
yourRights.howTo: You can exercise these rights through the Settings page: export your data, clear all local data, or disable analytics. For additional requests, contact us.

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights, contact us at:

updates.title: 8. Policy Updates
updates.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.
